mapper.select:
select rec_seq , convert(varchar(19),rec_datm,121) as rec_datm , rec_date , convert(varchar(8),rec_start_time,108) as rec_start_time , convert(varchar(8),rec_end_time,108) as rec_end_time , convert(varchar(8),rec_call_time,108) as rec_call_time , system_code, business_code , local_no,channel_no,rec_keycode,rec_inout,rec_filename,user_id,user_name , isnull(cust_id,'') cust_id,isnull(cust_name,'') cust_name,isnull(cust_tel,'') cust_tel,isnull(cust_jumin,'') cust_jumin , web_url
, (select count(*) from tbl_eval_event_result_list WITH(NOLOCK)
where event_code=#{event_code} and eval_user_id=#{_eval_user_id} and rec_seq=A.rec_seq ) eval_cnt
from tbl_record A WITH(NOLOCK) where rec_datm between convert(datetime, #{rec_date1} + ' 00:00:00.000') and convert(datetime, #{rec_date2} + ' 23:59:59.997') and rec_start_time between #{rec_start_time1} and #{rec_start_time2} and rec_call_time between #{rec_call_time1} and #{rec_call_time2}
and user_id = #{user_id}
and cust_name like #{cust_name} + '%'
order by rec_datm asc, rec_start_time asc
